1.title: Critical Condition
1.plot: Ann Curry reports on three families caught in the health care crisis.

2.title: A Circle of Hands
2.plot: In this inspirational show, a struggling community rallies around a single mother after she discovers two of her three kids face a deadly disease.

3.title: Faces Against Violence

imdb.plot outline: From once-promising cities in decline, to poverty in the Midwest, to working migrant children, NBC News' "Dateline" presents "America Now," a special series examining issues facing Americans today and how communities across the country are pulling together to rise above these adverse times. These varied stories capture the lives of Americans who are hurting, but still helping each other despite the tough economy. The issues are daunting, but the stories are inspiring.
imdb.title: Dateline: America Now

These varied stories capture the lives of Americans who are hurting, but still helping each other despite the tough economy. The issues are daunting, but the stories are inspiring.
